PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-07452012-05-31,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TBS
ActSpecial Retirement Arrangements Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Retirement Compensation Arrangements Regulations, No. 1
PrecisRegulations Amending the RETIREMENT COMPENSATION ARRANGEMENTS REGULATIONS, NO. 1 in order to (1) facilitate mobility into and out of the Public Service, by allowing employees to transfer the actuarial value of their accrued pension credits; and (2) rectify discrepancies identified by the Standing Joint Committee on the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0114 Publication Date: 2012-06-20
AttachmentsAttachment
